Command: 3D Setting - Direct access to 3D Setting menu (X30/X70/X90/RS45/55/65)
3D Format - Cycles through all available 3D formats (X30/X70/X90/RS45/55/65)
Advanced - Direct access to Picture Adjust > Advanced menu (HD550/950/990/X3/X7/X9/ X30/X70/X90/RS15/25/35/40/50/60/45/55/65)
Back - Steps backwards through menus and removes any OSD messages
Clear Motion Drive - Cycles through: Off/ Mode 1/Mode 2/Mode 3/Mode 4/Inverse Telecine (X3/X7/X9/X30/X70/X90/RS40/50/60/45/55/65)

Colour Management - Cycles through: Off/ Custom 1/Custom 2/Custom 3
(X7/X9/X70/X90/RS50/60/55/65)

Colour Profile - Cycles through all available Colour Profiles
(X7/X9/X79/X90/RS50/60/55/65)
Colour Space - Cycles through Standard/ Wide 1/Wide 2 (X3/X30/RS40/RS45)
Picture Tone Blue – (X7/X9/RS50/60 - Film Mode Only) (X70/X90/RS55/65 - All Modes)
Picture Tone Blue + (X7/X9/RS50/60 - Film Mode Only) (X70/X90/RS55/65 - All Modes)
Picture Tone Green – (X7/X9/RS50/60 - Film Mode Only) (X70/X90/RS55/65 - All Modes)
Picture Tone Green + (X7/X9/RS50/60 - Film Mode Only) (X70/X90/RS55/65 - All Modes)
Picture Tone Red – (X7/X9/RS50/60 - Film Mode Only) (X70/X90/RS55/65 - All Modes)
Picture Tone Red + (X7/X9/RS50/60 - Film Mode Only) (X70/X90/RS55/65 - All Modes)
Picture Tone White – (X7/X9/RS50/60 - Film Mode Only) (X70/X90/RS55/65 - All Modes)
Picture Tone White + (X7/X9/RS50/60 - Film Mode Only) (X70/X90/RS55/65 - All Modes)

Lens Aperture – If Lens Aperture Gauge is not displayed - displays gauge. If Lens Aperture Gauge is already displayed - Lens Aperture is decreased
(X3/X7/X9/X30/X70/X90/RS40/50/60/45/55/65)

Lens Aperture + If Lens Aperture Gauge is not displayed - displays gauge. If Lens Aperture Gauge is already displayed - Lens Aperture is increased
(X3/X7/X9/X30/X70/X90/RS40/50/60/45/55/65)

Lens Aperture Adj. (HD350/750/950/990/ RS10/20/25/35 - Adjustment Bar On/Off toggle) (X3/X7/X9/X30/X70/X90/RS40/50/60/45/55/65 - Displays Adjustment Bar)
(HD550/RS15 - Cycles through all options)

Lens Memory - Cycles through Lens Memory Pages: Select/Save/Name Edit
(X30/X70/X90/RS45/55/65)
Picture Mode - Cinema 1 (X3/X7/X9/X30/X70/ X90/RS40/50/60/45/55/65 - Film Mode)
Picture Mode - Cinema 2 (X3/X7/X9/X30/X70/ X90/RS40/50/60/45/55/65 - Cinema Mode)
Picture Mode - Cinema 3 (HD550/750/990/ RS15/25/35) (X3/X7/X9/X30/X70/X90/ RS40/50/60/45/55/65 - Animation Mode)
Power - Off (send twice with short delay between to switch off)
Shutter - Off - Un-synchronises shutter with “Hide” function (HD550/950/990/X3/X7/X9/ X30/X70/X90/RS15/25/35/40/50/60/45/55/65)

Shutter - On - Synchronises shutter with “Hide” function (HD550/950/990/X3/X7/X9/
X30/X70/X90/RS15/25/35/40/50/60/45/55/65)
User - Cycles through User 1 - User 5 Picture Modes (X30/X70/X90/RS45/55/65)
